author: Gerard Baker
title: The 10-Point.
text:
Good morning,
McMaster and Commander
On another day in Washington when the news came in battalions, the White House said President Trump would name John Bolton to replace Lt. Gen. H.R. McMaster as national security adviser—after weeks of Mr. Trump’s discussing potential successors. The president’s third national security adviser in 14 months, Mr. Bolton has been a controversial figure in Washington over a long career in the foreign-policy world. Recently in editorials and especially as a Fox News commentator, he has repeatedly... To Read the Full Story Subscribe Sign In
